lines: Welcome to the game! I'm here to guide you through this adventure.
Your mission is to defeat all enemies in each level to progress.
Use WASD to move, mouse to look around, and left-click to shoot.
Press SPACE to dash and avoid enemy attacks.
You can interact with terminals using the E key to unlock doors.
Once all enemies are defeated, find the exit door to proceed to the next level.
Good luck on your journey, brave warrior!
